attributes.action: invest in British motorsports in order to safeguard the future of the British Grand Prix
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A staple on the Formula One calendar since the beginning of the World Championship in 1950, the British Grand Prix has recently come under threat from F1 authorities due to the substandard facilities at Silverstone, currently Britain's premier racing venue. We request that the Prime Minister seeks to fund the redevelopment of Silverstone and increase government support for motorsports in general, to safeguard Britain's place at the heart of global motorsports and protect our rich motorsporting legacy.
